version_description:
- Other teams in the game fluctuate more
- Fewer injury messages
- Fix for "double-press" duplicate result/match-skip issues
- Fix for datapack issue affecting teams with zero stadium capacity
- Fix for "Five trophies in one season" bug
- Fix "undefined" cup history after taking over Champ club
- Correct cup abbreviations on chairman history page

- Reduced "button lockout" time
- Fixed bug which was incorrectly setting player transfer status
- Fixed bug which was triggering "back to back promotions" after winning Prem

- Fix for unresponsive match buttons
- You can now import saved games from Football Chairman Lite
- Fix for Turkish connectivity problems

- Sound effects added to matchday screen. These are turned off by default, to turn them on, go to "Settings" (spanner icon, top right), then "Preferences".
- Fix for bug where you couldn't downgrade training/youth facilities if your club was over its overdraft limit.
- Other minor bugfixes and gameplay improvements.

- You can now see how some of your chairman records compare to the very best scores from other users round the world: go to the Chairman page and click the 'Highscores' button!

- A new option on the Settings > Preferences page allows you to turn off the vector stadium graphics. This should help if your device has low memory or crashes the app when displaying the stadium.

- New default English datapack for 2016/17: to play with this, you'll need to start a new game
- Two additional 'Popular datapacks' listed on startup (currently Italian and Spanish teams 2016/17)
- Can now load or import an old game from the initial 'Welcome' screen instead of having to create a club
- Fixed bug which caused the app to crash for some people on Stadium/Money pages
- Updated all third-party software to provide greater stability and security

- New default English datapack for 2016/17: to play with this, you'll need to start a new game
- Two additional 'Popular datapacks' listed on startup (currently Italian and Spanish teams 2016/17)
- Can now load or import an old game from the initial 'Welcome' screen instead of having to create a club
- Fixed bug which caused the app to crash for some people on Stadium/Money pages
- Updated all third-party software to provide greater stability and security

- New default English datapack for 2016/17: to play with this, you'll need to start a new game
- Two additional 'Popular datapacks' listed on startup (currently Italian and Spanish teams 2016/17)
- Can now load or import an old game from the initial 'Welcome' screen instead of having to create a club
- Fixed bug which caused the app to crash for some people on Stadium/Money pages
- Fixed issue which caused some users to lose data when their phone storage was low
- Updated all third-party software to provide greater stability and security

- New default English datapack for the 2017-18 season! All teams updated and re-rated. To play with the new datapack, you'll need to start a new game from the Settings menu ("spanner" icon, top right).

- Spanish language option. To play in Spanish, choose this language either at the start of the game or from the Settings menu.

- Auto-save functionality. Once you've entered an email and password, the game will auto-save once per season. This won't count towards your "one save per season" total.

- Minor bug fixes and technical improvements.

- Technical updates for iOS 11
- Minor amendments the new English datapack for the 2017-18 season. To play with the new datapack, you'll need to start a new game from the Settings menu ("wrench" icon, top right)
- Tweaks to value of newly-signed players
- Selected transfer budget highlighted on "Money > Transfers" page
- Other minor bugfixes and technical improvements
Technical updates for latest Apple software/hardware.

- Fixes issue with iOS deleting app data when storage gets low.
- New languages available: German, French, Portuguese and Italian (along with English and Spanish).
- Other minor bugfixes and technical amendments.

- Updated layout to fill iPhone X screen
- Improved layout on 12.9" iPad Pro
- Moved wage payments to weekend to make weekly financial summary clearer
- "Profit/loss this year" on Money page now shows "live" figure instead of updating weekly
- Other minor bugfixes and technical improvements

- Updated layout to fill iPhone X screen
- Improved layout on 12.9" iPad Pro
- Moved wage payments to the weekend to make weekly financial summary clearer
- "Profit/loss this year" on Money page now shows "live" amount instead of updating weekly
- Other minor bugfixes and technical improvements

* Please note, if you're in the middle of a game, we'd advise saving your game to our servers before installing any update. Click the "wrench" icon at the top right and enter your email and password.

- You can now boost your club's finances free of charge by watching rewarded videos. Visit the Money > Investments screen.
- Latest English datapack.
- Technical updates to ensure the app works on the latest devices and operating systems.

* Please note, if you're in the middle of a game, we'd advise saving your game to our servers before installing any update.

- Technical improvements to ensure compatibility with future operating system updates.
